title: Drawing, "China Display on Shelf, Wallpaper Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and blue and gray gouache, graphite on heavy cream paper with white printed ground
inscribed: Inscribed on verso in red crayon, lower right:  Tommi Parzinger/220 East 57th St./N.Y.C./Design # 123
description: Possibly for a kitchen or dining room, a shelf displaying china is located above a diagonal-shaped pattern with - / + motif at each center. Design is rendered in shades of blue and gray against a cream background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "China Display on Shelf, Wallpaper Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and blue and gray gouache, graphite on heavy cream paper with white printed ground. Gift of Donald Cameron. 1998-19-136.
